title: (x) Unicase face in newspaper ad for Gallo wines - FF Disturbance {Forrest}
content:
Found this in a newspaper ad for Gallo wines. At first I thought it might be Filosofia, but no. What is it, and have they mixed different styles, or is that l in Smile really like that?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203174623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/meet_face_to_face_4671.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Rounded "P" condensed serif font - Bernard MT Condensed {Nick Cooke}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203174623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38583 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Geometric text sans w/ low x-height and vertical tail on Q - Vogue {Mark Foster} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203174623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38560 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mili

comments.content: Thank you so much, it was disturbing me.
The caps look like Times or sumptin’. Blech…
